description:
Benefits:
  • 401(k)
  • Dental insurance
  • Health insurance
  • Paid time off
  • Profit sharing
  • Vision insurance


Submit resume General Warehouse Duties Driver when needed This job is mainly general warehouse duties. Company pays 100% medical and dental and vision. Responsibilities:
  • Process, package and ship orders
  • Organize stock and maintain inventory
  • Inspect products for defects and damages
  • Examine in coming and outgoing shipments
  • Check, verify and fill customer invoices
  • Abide by all company safety and hygiene regulations
  • Keep warehouse clean and organized
  • Ability to lift or move heavy products
  • Must be able to frequently push, pull, squat, bend, stand


Paid holidays
benefits: 401(k), Dental insurance, Health insurance, Paid time off, Profit sharing, Vision insurance
